translations: 胖的（fat 的最高级）；丰满的

sentences.sentence: That's (the fattest) cat in my house.
sentences.translation: 那是我家最肥的一只猫。

sentences.sentence: Oh... And here is the fattest guy in the world!
sentences.translation: 噢…这位是世界最胖的人！

sentences.sentence: Little monkey won the prize. He said push the fattest two out.
sentences.translation: 小猴子得了奖，他说把最胖的两个人推下去。
